post.description:
Use this API to translate a single document.
All supported document formats can be obtained with formats API.
Single Glossary / Translation memory can be included in the request and applied by the service when the document is translated.

parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Region
parameters.description:
The value is the region of the translator resource. This value is optional if when custom endpoint is used.
The value can be found in Azure portal. Translator resource => Resource Management => Keys and Endpoint => Location/Region

parameters.name: X-ClientTraceId
parameters.description: A client-generated GUID to uniquely identify the request.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Etag comparison, if it is provided and its value matches the response then request will return Status => 304 (Not modified).

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: Document to be translated in the form

parameters.name: glossary
parameters.description: Glossary / translation memory will be used during translation in the form.

200.description: Successful request and the document is translated. The translated document is returned in the body.

X-RequestId.description: Value generated by the service to identify the request. It is used for troubleshooting purposes.

ETag.description: This will have value of response hash, customer can provide this value for any consecutive request as “If-None-Match” header. To make sure get response if the value is changed otherwise 304.

X-RequestId.description: Value generated by the service to identify the request. It is used for troubleshooting purposes.

ETag.description: This will have value of response hash, customer can provide this value for any consecutive request as “If-None-Match” header. To make sure get response if the value is changed otherwise 304.

document.description: Document to be translated in the form

glossary.description: Glossary / translation memory will be used during translation in the form.

DocumentTranslateResult.description: Successful request and the document is translated. The translated document is returned in the body.

ErrorDetails.description: Error details as returned by Translator Service.

ErrorResponse.description: Representation of the Error Response from Translator Service.

DocumentTranslateParameters.allowFallbac.name: AllowFallback
DocumentTranslateParameters.allowFallbac.description:
Specifies that the service is allowed to fall back to a general system when a custom system doesn't exist. 
    Possible values are: true (default) or false.
    allowFallback=false specifies that the translation should only use systems trained for the category specified 
    by the request. If a translation for language X to language Y requires chaining through a pivot language E, 
    then all the systems in the chain (X → E and E → Y) will need to be custom and have the same category. 
    If no system is found with the specific category, the request will return a 400 status code. allowFallback=true 
    specifies that the service is allowed to fall back to a general system when a custom system doesn't exist.

DocumentTranslateParameters.category.name: Category
DocumentTranslateParameters.category.description:
A string specifying the category (domain) of the translation. This parameter is used to get translations 
    from a customized system built with Custom Translator. Add the Category ID from your Custom Translator 
    project details to this parameter to use your deployed customized system. Default value is: general.

DocumentTranslateParameters.sourceLangua.name: SourceLanguage
DocumentTranslateParameters.sourceLangua.description:
Specifies the language of the input document. If the from parameter isn't specified, 
    automatic language detection is applied to determine the source language.

DocumentTranslateParameters.targetLangua.name: TargetLanguage
DocumentTranslateParameters.targetLangua.description:
Specifies the language of the output document. The target language must be one of the supported languages included 
    in the translation scope. For example, use targetLanguage=de to translate to German.
